info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wayne and southern Macomb Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Detroit Zoo, or near Warren, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warren around 635 PM EDT. Grosse Pointe around 645 PM EDT. St. Clair Shores and Mount Clemens around 650 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Northeast Detroit, Harper Woods, Grosse Pointe Shores, Center Line, Roseville, Grosse Pointe Woods, Clinton Township, Grosse Pointe Park, Grosse Pointe Farms and Utica. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
